column1: Uchi////Customer service experience is THE GOLD standard. I have never experienced such good customer service. Â No one is perfect but its how you handle situations like this is what separates you from a good place and an exemplary place. We had a misplaced item in our food
column2: we showed it to our chef as we sat at the bar and IMMEDIATELY the head sushi chef
column4: followed by the server came to address our concerns
column6: and comped several of our items. Yoshio
column8: gave us his card and encouraged us to write a review as he said it reminds us (them) to continually improve.
